title: Understanding the Lens
text: The lens that focuses on understanding relationships and patterns within data is often used to identify trends and correlations.

title: Focus on Patterns
text: This lens involves using mathematical techniques to analyze data and uncover patterns.

title: Statistical Techniques
text: Consider the lens that uses statistical methods to interpret data and draw conclusions about the relationships between variables.

title: Identifying the Correct Lens
text: The lens that focuses on understanding relationships and patterns within data is called Statistical Analysis.
